title: The Witcher Remake Announced! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.26.22
description:
CD Projekt RED has announced a remake of The Witcher! Blessing and Greg talk about it, a new PlayStation studio, Capcom news, and Hideo Kojima teasing his next game.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:50 - Housekeeping

A new Gamescast is up, with us talking about Marvel Snap, A Plague Tale Requiem, Bayonetta, Overwatch 2, and our predictions for the rest of the year. You can find that on youtube.com/kindafunnygames and o podcast services around the globe.

After today's episode of KFGD, Greg is busting ghosts once again in Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed with a full crew! If you miss it live, catch the archive on youtube.com/kindafunnygames


The Roper Report  -

00:09:45 - CD Projekt Red Announces a Remake of The Witcher in Unreal Engine 5
00:24:29 - PlayStation is Building a New Studio to Work with Naughty Dog on an Unannounced Game
00:42:29 - Ad
00:44:25 - We got a Dragon Age update
00:56:01 - Capcom is flourishing
00:57:56 - Hideo Kojima claims his new game is ‘like a new medium’
01:00:31 - Rocksteady’s co-founders are leaving the studio
01:06:00 - We have our first look at the Fallout tv show
01:08:09 - Wo Long Fallen Dynasty has a date
01:08:40 - Out today
01:11:18 - “What is a GROP Shop?” - Damp Carrots
01:12:48 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless & Tim
